description: Illegal operations players can choose to engage in with risk/reward mechanics

simple_operations.name: Harvest Buffer Zone Violation
simple_operations.story: Your crew supervisor suggests 'adjusting' the buffer zone boundaries. Those extra trees near the creek are worth serious money.

simple_operations.name: Exceed Cut Block Boundaries
simple_operations.story: GPS shows premium timber just 50m beyond your boundary. Your crew chief says nobody will notice.

simple_operations.name: Underreport Harvest Volumes
simple_operations.description: Scale logs smaller to reduce fees
simple_operations.story: The scaling supervisor hints that reported volumes could be 'conservative'. 20% underreporting saves massive stumpage fees.

simple_operations.name: Bypass Archaeological Assessment
simple_operations.story: Archaeological assessment has been pending for 6 months. Your crew leader suggests just proceeding.

complex_operations.name: Government Contract Kickback Scheme
complex_operations.description: Multi-year corruption operation with government officials
complex_operations.story: A government official offers preferential treatment for timber licenses in exchange for regular payments.

complex_operations.name: Cross-Border Timber Laundering
complex_operations.description: International smuggling ring for restricted timber
complex_operations.story: Export restricted old-growth timber through shell companies to overseas buyers at premium prices.

complex_operations.name: Tax Evasion Network
complex_operations.story: Your accountant knows people who can make profits 'disappear' through Caribbean shell companies.
